name: Rain on the Pane
text:
They say the rain on the pane falls mainly down the drain. Harth must have planned ahead!

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, April 2022.

name: Shimmering Snowflake
text: Solve the mysteries hidden throughout Alterac Valley.

name: Year of the Gryphon
text:
We braved the trials of the Barrens, survived the schemes of Stormwind, and ascended to the peaks of Alterac!

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, March 2022.
